77d3d323-3bb2-43c2-b391-86b73a835a1d.name: 仆从
77d3d323-3bb2-43c2-b391-86b73a835a1d.notes: IQ 为 0 或者有奴性

9ea372c8-6135-47c3-a0d7-5d5004352c35.name: 感同身受
9ea372c8-6135-47c3-a0d7-5d5004352c35.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0

8f250791-c052-4f3c-8d79-9ad2c4cd7c30.name: 感同身受
8f250791-c052-4f3c-8d79-9ad2c4cd7c30.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

93acb831-45bb-4f82-a3f9-7261e39177b0.name: 感同身受
93acb831-45bb-4f82-a3f9-7261e39177b0.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡

4091a485-c872-4c03-a94e-1640d8b7625e.name: 感同身受
4091a485-c872-4c03-a94e-1640d8b7625e.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

38882bf9-9ab5-4817-87f6-b71b2c8dd759.name: 能使用超自然能力获得情报

cc92e1c3-3963-43cb-b596-00be02074834.name: 健康
cc92e1c3-3963-43cb-b596-00be02074834.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

57d362d8-8f61-4625-9af6-9f3bc1fa5cda.name: Fit, Very
57d362d8-8f61-4625-9af6-9f3bc1fa5cda.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

aae6dc1f-0dbd-41f8-abd4-a7cb0fdab9aa.name: 高痛阈
aae6dc1f-0dbd-41f8-abd4-a7cb0fdab9aa.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

0b02f3d5-8c2e-4734-88a8-75cc8ccc0121.name: Luck, Extraordinary
0b02f3d5-8c2e-4734-88a8-75cc8ccc0121.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play. Replaces Luck

2b80d853-40eb-4958-868c-77282e248a71.name: 易于命中
2b80d853-40eb-4958-868c-77282e248a71.notes: 其他人可以将你的双眼作为攻击目标仅受到 -6 命中减值

47fc66b5-0d1c-4295-ac9f-d66e4b39d64b.name: 慢速
47fc66b5-0d1c-4295-ac9f-d66e4b39d64b.notes: 你每 12 小时额外恢复 1 HP

df961bab-61a3-445f-9624-1f7fe5061d8f.name: 常规
df961bab-61a3-445f-9624-1f7fe5061d8f.notes: 你每 1 小时额外恢复 1 HP

4f473126-52a4-4b84-9b4a-e60832c15b5d.name: 快速
4f473126-52a4-4b84-9b4a-e60832c15b5d.notes: 你每 1 分钟额外恢复 1 HP

e081d63d-6e84-41ee-8ce8-69bb110058fc.name: 高速
e081d63d-6e84-41ee-8ce8-69bb110058fc.notes: 你每 1 秒额外恢复 1 HP

48011cc6-0ebc-4b36-a454-29c1082dab8f.name: 极度
48011cc6-0ebc-4b36-a454-29c1082dab8f.notes: 你每 1 秒额外恢复 10 HP

bbebbdac-a61a-4ecc-adb9-f5c7d83285d7.notes: 几乎所有人，刨去@一大群人@

a7b347f8-184a-49e5-9017-41ea8a2b7feb.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

efc7b12d-39ed-4f88-8b92-887947539a28.name: 标志性装备
efc7b12d-39ed-4f88-8b92-887947539a28.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

e70c08a8-3cb7-4a92-b6db-7b628bd8cd69.name: Weapon Bond
e70c08a8-3cb7-4a92-b6db-7b628bd8cd69.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

e1e09f68-b342-4167-9072-4d85658bd479.name: 60 points chosen from
e1e09f68-b342-4167-9072-4d85658bd479.notes: You may learn Autohypnosis and Body Control, ignoring prerequisites

1977274a-240b-41ef-b09b-37751d7e2297.name: Temporary Disadvantage, Vulnerability ( Blinding Attacks) x2

330a610d-59c0-4a02-9802-449bee3ea46d.name: 战斗反射
330a610d-59c0-4a02-9802-449bee3ea46d.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

3757dcff-127c-4832-920e-6b9a083b2cd4.name: 幸运
3757dcff-127c-4832-920e-6b9a083b2cd4.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

e3493ad1-07d1-49dd-a169-1ac48f071b0d.name: 邪恶双生子
e3493ad1-07d1-49dd-a169-1ac48f071b0d.notes: 在你拥有的能力上更加强大或拥有你没有的能力

224bc9f9-1078-4f5a-949b-c05afb5f8e2e.name: 邪恶双生子
224bc9f9-1078-4f5a-949b-c05afb5f8e2e.notes: 在你拥有的能力上更加强大且拥有你没有的能力

0e0e98cb-8ded-4c66-bd54-8ed547ec2af9.name: 执念
0e0e98cb-8ded-4c66-bd54-8ed547ec2af9.notes: Destroy all copies of my file

129ed954-e2dc-42d4-a741-956f8fce548d.notes: 使得你获得每轮用两只手各招架一次的能力。
